name: Horror Flight Sim
description:
You are the pilot of an aircraft in a world filled with mist. Monsters hidden in the mist will attack if they get too close.  Your goal is to fly to the anomaly while using your radar to avoid the monsters.

Controls

A/D - Change yaw

Q/E - Change speed

R/F - Change altitude

Asset Credits

Sounds: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256

Aircraft model: Bomber B1-B West (Unreal Marketplace) 

Additional Credits

Neil McHenry - Modeling and Concept Art

Anushka Potdar - Brainstorming and conceptualization
